official_title: Resilience Measurement, Prediction, and Its Role in Older Adults With Late-Stage Lung Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 65 or older
* English-speaking
* The patient has a diagnosis of late-stage (III-IV) lung cancer and is living at his/her home.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 65 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unable to provide informed consent
* Visual or hearing impairments that preclude participation
* Serious mental illness
